segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for her brother to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she really believes he's going to succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must trust her brother a lot to stand there and wait like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not trying to stop him or tell him to be careful, she's just waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's going to get in trouble too, for not saying anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must really want a cookie to be so patient and quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets what she wants, but I'm worried about what might happen if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a sweet moment between siblings, but it's also a little risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's going to be so happy when she finally gets that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
